job_tasks.phrase: je onderhoudt de applicatie en richt de LTB-processen in
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'onderhoudt de applicatie' refers to maintaining existing software, and 'richt de LTB-processen in' suggests setting up processes for the application, which falls under software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: je richt de onboarding volgens de Cloud standaarden van a.s.r. in
job_tasks.justification: Setting up onboarding according to cloud standards implies configuring and managing cloud-based applications and infrastructure, a key part of software development in cloud environments.

job_tasks.phrase: de applicatie onderhoud je door bugs te fixen en het verbeteren van de code, alerting en monitoring in Application Insights
job_tasks.justification: Fixing bugs, improving code, and setting up alerting/monitoring are core software development and maintenance activities.

job_tasks.phrase: je zorgt ervoor dat nieuwe gebruikers binnen a.s.r. worden aangesloten en bouwt interfaces voor nieuwe bronnen en consumerende systemen
job_tasks.justification: Connecting new users and building interfaces for new sources and consuming systems are direct software development tasks involving integration and system interaction.

job_tasks.phrase: je ontwikkelt interfaces voor het aansluiten op het DataWareHouse en nieuwe features
job_tasks.justification: Developing interfaces for connecting to a Data Warehouse and for new features is a clear software development task focused on data integration and feature implementation.

soft_skills.phrase: bugs te fixen en het verbeteren van de code
het verbeteren van de code, alerting en monitoring
bouwt interfaces voor nieuwe bronnen en consumerende systemen
ontwikkelt interfaces voor het aansluiten op het DataWareHouse en nieuwe features

classification.rationale: The job description heavily focuses on maintaining and developing interfaces for applications and data integration, aligning with traditional software development tasks. There is no mention of generative AI, large language models, or other advanced AI modeling techniques, making it fall outside the scope of a GenAI Engineer.
